name: 3 Queers and a Question Mark
description:
Play as Kasper, a young man still figuring out his own gender identity. With the help of other trans characters, you explore the wild world of gender and expression through a group chat and a short vignette!

You can use the left mouse button to click and interact with the chat, vignette and menu.

This demo was made for my Master Project at LUCA School of Arts.

I'd like to thank my teachers, friends & family for their support.

Extra thanks to weirdybeardyman and Jorrit De Locht for their technical support and advice.

If you want to give feedback or just comment follow this link --> https://forms.gle/9t3eHcq3KowG2f9J9

More info on the trans topic in Dutch: https://transgenderinfo.be/
